data.partBlankContent: I wonder if I should begin preparations to transplant these irises. It h__ been temp_____, b__ we've st___ had a frost wit___ the la__ week. Maybe I should ho__ off un___ the gro___ is a bit mo__ toasty, just s_ the bu___ don't suf___. Yes, I'm sure that we will see fairer days next week.
data.fullContent: I wonder if I should begin preparations to transplant these irises. It has been temperate, but we've still had a frost within the last week. Maybe I should hold off until the ground is a bit more toasty, just so the bulbs don't suffer. Yes, I'm sure that we will see fairer days next week.
data.answer: 我不知道我是否应该开始准备移植这些鸢尾花。天气很温和，但上周还是下了霜。也许我应该等到地面稍微暖和一点，这样这些根茎就不会受罪了。是的，我相信下周我们的日子会更好。
